contents.text: Welcome to The Trade Desk New York, where we transform advertising through our AI-driven technology platform.
For sales and new business inquiries, press 1.
To learn more about our AI-powered ad buying platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly get a summary of the AI ad-buying platform's key features
I want to talk to a sales specialist about using your AI ad platform to promote my veteran-owned business.
Get pricing and integration details for your AI-driven ad buying platform API.
I need someone to explain how this advertising platform works.
I want to understand the algorithmic approach your AI ad-buying platform uses for real-time bidding.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized demo of our technology, press 2.
Please hold while we set up your demo appointment.

navigationGoals: Schedule a one-on-one demo of the platform at my earliest convenience
I need to schedule a personalized demo to see how your platform can support my small business operations.
Schedule a personalized demo highlighting dynamic bidding and audience segmentation features.
I want to schedule a convenient demo of the platform.
I’d like to schedule a hands-on demo of the platform to walk through its features.

contents.text: For technical support and account assistance, press 2.
To report a technical issue with your dashboard, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Report a malfunction on my ad campaign dashboard and get it fixed
I’m unable to access my campaign metrics on the dashboard and need technical assistance.
Report that my dashboard API is returning 502 errors when fetching campaign performance metrics.
I'm having trouble with my dashboard and need technical help.
My dashboard isn’t updating with the latest campaign metrics; can you troubleshoot it?

contents.text: For billing questions or account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing team.

navigationGoals: Clarify a billing discrepancy on my latest invoice
I’d like to review my billing and ensure my veteran discount has been applied correctly.
Update my company’s billing info and request last month’s invoice breakdown.
I need help understanding my billing statement.
I need to review my most recent invoice and set up automatic payments for my account.
